title.rendered: Send your own machines to us. But, only if you really, really want to.

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_fullwidth_image src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/2.-Green-Cryptoming-send-machines-2.png” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″ module_alignment=”left” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”3.13.1″]"Reading < 1 "minute"[/et_pb_code][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”|700|||||||” header_font=”Source Sans Pro|700|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”47px” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left”]

Send your own machines to us. But, only if you really, really want to.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left”]We’ve got plenty of space on our shelves to host your own machines. But we want to warn you…

..it’s going to be a lot simpler if you purchase one of our pre-installed miners.

We’ve already sent them through customs, had their electronics checked and paid all the taxes.

Read this article, to find out how purchasing one of our pre-installed Antminer S9s works.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/antminer-for-you-with-cyberian-mine.jpeg” always_center_on_mobile=”off” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”50px||50px|” custom_padding_phone=”25px||25px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left”]However, if your heart is set on sending us your machines, we will be happy to accept your relocation if you deliver them to our facility. Then they will be seriously tested, and if they will work fine, will be irreversibly converted to miners on our platform with all the features that it offers.
Please be aware that it works only for bigger batches of miners and that they all will become a part of our stable hashrate insurance model.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”50px|||”]

How hosting your machine with us will work

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left”]Once your machine has been delivered and installed you will be able to monitor it on the mining-pool just like any of our pre-installed machines.

This means you can put 7 (dollar cents — because the calculator uses dollars) per kwh into a mining calculator,  like this one, and get a good idea of how much NET profit you will make when you mine with us.

We set your units to mine directly to your wallet and then we invoice you at the end of the month for your costs.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/asic-miners-on-the-shelf.jpeg” always_center_on_mobile=”off” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”25px||25px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”50px|||”]

What will it cost to get started?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left”]You will need to cover the cost of delivering your machines to our facilities in Irkutsk. This price will vary from country to country, and we will work with you to find the best logistic options.

The whole delivery and customs clearance is on you, we only receive devices at our doors.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Divider Blue Line” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_line_height=”3em” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”50px||50px|”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”50px|||”]

Let’s do this

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”25px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left”]If you’ve read everything, and you still want to send us your machines then let’s make it happen. Email support@cyberianmine.de and we’ll find a way to make things work — but keep in mind it will always be much easier to go with our pre-installs.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_post_nav in_same_term=”off” prev_text=”Previous Article” next_text=”Next Article” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ title_font=”Source Sans Pro|700|||||||” title_font_size=”20px” custom_padding=”50px|||”][/et_pb_post_nav][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
